flawed_nl_solution:
Evelyn takes 2 days a week off from work, so she is at work 7 - 2 = <<7-2=5>>5 days a week.
Thus, she uses 60 / 5 = <<60/5=21>>21 sheets of paper per day at work.
#### 21

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 21. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
